import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import "./Fag.css" const Fag = () => { const[fags,setFags]=useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:5000/fags') .then(res => setFags(res.data.fags)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) },[]) return (
